Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gave a broad feedback touching various points whereas teachers could give a deep-dive into specific points only

Question 41.Response: Feedback from a teacher was more reassuring for me than feedback from AI
